What's Alpaca?

Alpaca is a commission-free trading platform that provides an API for algorithmic trading. It offers:

  • Commission-free trading
  • Robust API for algorithmic trading
  • Access to US stock markets
  • Paper trading environment

What can you trade with Alpaca?

With Alpaca, you can trade the following assets:

  • Stocks
  • Funds
  • Crypto
  • Indices
  • Options

Hedge trading is not available, only One-Way Mode is supported.

API key setup

Follow the steps below to configure your API Keys.

{% include 'include/warnings.html' with warning='Never share your API keys with anyone. Our platform uses industry-standard encryption to protect your credentials.' %}

1 Create an Alpaca Account

Sign up for an Alpaca account if you don't have one. Sign up here.

2 Get API Keys

  1. Log in to your Alpaca account
  2. In the Home page, scroll down to the "API Key" section
  3. Click on "Regenerate" to generate a new set of keys
  4. Copy your API Key and Secret Key for use in our platform

Complete Integration

Once you have your API Key and Secret Key, return to our platform's Automate section to link your Alpaca account. This will enable automated trading based on your TradingView alerts.
